content: Hey @T-clippy . Sorry I haven't been able to give much attention to Clippy lately since getting a new job. Things are good but it's just harder for me to divide my attention. I need to take a break from reviewing at least for a while. I can try to get to open PRs soon but feel free to take them from me.
It's good to take a break early, best of luck to you :upside_down:
its better to take a break than have the break take you :see_no_evil:
